summary: This document is an email transmitting a search warrant application for a second New York residence associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It was sent by an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, indicating an active investigation into Epstein's properties.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The search warrant is for a property associated with him, indicating he is the central figure of the investigation.

events.title: Transmission of Search Warrant Application
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a search warrant application for a second New York residence linked to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A search warrant application was prepared for a second New York residence linked to Jeffrey Epstein.
The document was transmitted by an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email date of July 7, 2019, indicates investigative activity around that time, prior to Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
The attachment is named 'Second_New_York_Residence_SW.v3.docx', suggesting it is the third version of the warrant.
The document confirms law enforcement was investigating multiple properties associated with Epstein in New York.
